thread.section_title: The Yorkshire Soap Company Reviews | Read Customer Service Reviews of yorkshiresoap.co.uk
thread.title: SALLY
thread.title_full: The Yorkshire Soap Company reviewed by SALLY

author: SALLY
title: SALLY
text:
Found this shop in York last month and tried products - loved them.
My daughter needed 3 birthday presents for 14 year old girls and decided to use this company.
Website was a doddle to use, great choice of products, competitive pricing, good delivery service and gorgeous packaging.
Will definitely be using again.
